dev@webowski.ru

The blank for a quick start of the web project.

Build

  • Install all dependencies by run npm i.
  • Run gulp to build styles, icons, templates and scripts.
  • Run gulp dev to start the development server (ะต.g. http://localost:3000) and automatically rebuild files when they are changing.

Add files

Adding a stylesheet

As separate SCSS or CSS

Add the path to a stylesheet in build/config.js in styles.separate section

styles: {
				separate: [
					'path/to/a.scss',
					'path/to/a.css',
				]
			}
As common SCSS

Add the path to a stylesheet in styles/common.scss

As common CSS

Add the path to a stylesheet in build/config.js in styles.common section

styles: {
				common: [
					'path/to/a.css',
				]
			}

Adding a script

As separate ESM or UMD

Add the script path in build/config.js in styles.separate.esm or styles.separate.umd section

scripts: {
				separate: {
					esm: [
						'path/to/a.esm.js',
					],
					umd: [
						'path/to/a.umd.js',
					]
				}
			}
As common ESM

Import the script in scripts/common.js

import './components/esm.js'
As common UMD
scripts: {
				common: {
					umd: [
						'path/to/a.umd.js',
					]
				}
			}

Adding an icon

  • Put the SVG file in folder images/icons
  • Run gulp icons
  • Copy the svg snippet from images/icons.html 
    <svg>
				<use xlink:href="#icon"></use>
			</svg>

CSS naming

UBEM

Components

Pictures

Retina display support

Add `@2x` right before the file extension.

col-24 md:col-12 lg:col-6
col-24 md:col-12
col-24 md:col-12

Button

Simple button
<button class="Btn">Simple button</button>
Primary button
<button class="Btn Btn--primary">Primary button</button>

Utilities

Text

<span class="fz-400 fw-800 color-major"></span>

Responsive grid

<div class="row  gap-sm lg:gap-md">
				<div class="col-12 md:col-4 lg:col-3">
			
				</div>
				<div class="col-12 md:col-8 lg:col-9">
			
				</div>
			</div>

Display property

<div class="d-block md:d-none"></div>
			
			<div class="xsOnly:d-none">Something not for smallest screens</div>
			
			<div class="print:d-none"></div>
			
			<div class="d-flex  justify-start md:justify-between  align-stretch">
				<div class="grow-1 shrink-0"></div>
			</div>
